articles.author: Lars Brandle
articles.title: Putri Ariani Leaves Simon Cowell ‘Speechless’ With U2 Cover on ‘AGT’: Watch - Billboard
articles.description: Simon Cowell noted that U2 personally cleared the song for Putri to sing on “America’s Got Talent.”
articles.content:
America’s Got Talent just found what it’s looking for — Putri Ariani.
Earlier in the competition, the Indonesian teenager blew minds and broke hearts with her audition, a performance of Elton John a… [+1867 chars]
